titles.title: Higher Education Transparency Act of 2019
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require the disclosure of agreements between institutions of higher education and certain foreign sources, and for other purposes.
Higher Education Transparency Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Higher Education Transparency Act of 2019
This bill expands disclosure requirements for an institution of higher education (IHE) that participates in student assistance programs. Specifically, the bill requires an IHE to post online the full content of any agreement between the IHE and a foreign source that provides language and cultural teaching resources and services to its students.
